original_text: And when the people entered the forest, behold, the honey was dropping, but no one put his hand to his mouth, for the people feared the oath.
korean_text: 백성이 수풀로 들어갈 때에 꿀이 흐르는 것을 보고도 그들이 맹세를 두려워하여 손을 그 입에 대는 자가 없었으나

sentences.original_text: And when the people entered the forest,
but no one put his hand to his mouth,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 자기 손을 입에 대지 않았다,

sentences.original_text: for the people feared the oath.
